summary: The Public Service Loan Forgiveness program is intended to encourage people to enter public service. It forgives the federal student loan balances of eligible borrowers who have made at least 10 years of payments while in certain public service jobs. The Department of Education denied 94% of program applicants from the Department of Defense. (We previously found a 99% denial rate for all applicants.) The...
title: Public Service Loan Forgiveness: DOD and Its Personnel Could Benefit from Additional Program Information
